00009 #include "LowpassFunction.h"
00010 
00011 
00012 LowpassFunction::LowpassFunction()
00013 : coefficient(0.75), one_minus_coefficient(0.25), feedback(0.0)
00014 {
00015 
00016 }
00017 
00018 LowpassFunction::~LowpassFunction()
00019 {
00020         ;
00021 }
00022 
00023 
00024 double LowpassFunction::mapValue(double x)
00025 {
00026         feedback = jamoma_anti_denormal((feedback * coefficient) + (x * one_minus_coefficient));
00027         return feedback;
00028 }
00029 
00030 
00031 JamomaError LowpassFunction::setParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00032 {
00033         if (parameterName==gensym("coefficient")) {
00034                 coefficient = atom_getfloat(argv);
00035                 one_minus_coefficient = 1.0 - coefficient;
00036                 return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00037         }
00038         else if (parameterName==gensym("feedback")) {
00039                 feedback = atom_getfloat(argv);
00040                 return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00041         }
00042         else
00043                 return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 JamomaError LowpassFunction::getParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00048 {
00049         if (parameterName==gensym("coefficient")) {
00050                 *argv = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom));
00051                 atom_setfloat(*argv, coefficient);
00052                 *argc = 1;
00053                 return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00054         }
00055         else{   
00056                 *argc = 0; *argv = NULL;
00057                 return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00058         }
00059 }
00060 
00061 JamomaError LowpassFunction::getFunctionParameters(long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00062 {
00063         
00064         int n = *argc = 2;
00065         *argv = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom) * n);
00066         atom_setsym(*argv, gensym("coefficient")); atom_setsym(*argv+1, gensym("feedback"));
00067         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00068         
00069 }
